title: Garden

properties.name: description
properties.value: A garden in a player-owned house is one of the only two types of rooms a player can build starting at level 1 Construction. Since every house is required to have an exit portal, every player has to have at least one garden or formal garden in their house. Building a garden costs 1,000.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Garden
For a list of all items and upgrades within the Construction skill, see Construction/Level up table.
This article is about the basic Construction garden. For other uses, see Garden (disambiguation).
Garden
Released31 May 2006 (Update)
Icon
Construction level1
Cost1,000
Door layout
Garden

A garden in a player-owned house is one of the only two types of rooms a player can build starting at level 1 Construction. Since every house is required to have an exit portal, every player has to have at least one garden or formal garden in their house. Building a garden costs 1,000.

There are 8 hotspots available:

  • Big Plant space 1
  • Big Plant space 2
  • Big Tree space
  • Centrepiece space
  • Small Plant space 1
  • Small Plant space 2
  • Tree space
  • Tip jar space

Contents

  • 1 Big plants
    • 1.1 Space 1
    • 1.2 Space 2
  • 2 Big Tree / Tree
  • 3 Centrepiece
  • 4 Small plants
    • 4.1 Space 1
    • 4.2 Space 2
  • 5 Tip jar

70 		5,709

100 		12,173

  1. ↑ A watering can with at least 1 dose is required.

Big Tree / Tree[edit | edit source]

  • Note: None of these trees may be chopped down for wood. They are purely decorative.
  • Note: The level boost from a cup of tea will work, but the crystal saw's boost will NOT work.

5 Tree Bagged dead tree 31
31 		1,524

70 		6,098

122 		16,663

141 		20,453
75 Magic tree Bagged magic tree 223
223 		51,020
  1. ↑ A watering can with at least 1 dose is required.
